selections.name: Cabaletto
selections.reason: Resumes here with a very strong fresh record (3:2-0-1) and a recent trial win. Has won at this track and handles soft going well. The one to beat.

selections.name: Seymour Stars
selections.reason: Unbeaten in three career starts and has already won on heavy going. This is a step up in class but looks to have serious ability.

selections.name: Concession
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class here. Form in BM70 grade is respectable and draws well to be competitive despite the weight.

selections.name: Hey Daisy
selections.reason: Won well fresh on soft going. Lightly raced and has upside.

danger_horse.name: Seymour Stars
danger_horse.reason: Undefeated horse who has proven ability on heavy ground.

selections.name: Caracoron
selections.reason: Absolute wet track specialist with 2 wins from 2 starts on Heavy. Third last start in a similar grade suggests he is peaking at the right time.

selections.name: Akkadian Emperor
selections.reason: Last start winner at Doomben in BM80 grade. Carries weight but has the class edge on this field.

selections.name: Lenape Vibe
selections.reason: Proven mudlark with a win on heavy. Recent form is solid including a 3rd in this grade last start.

selections.name: Ring Bearer
selections.reason: Consistent galloper who won last start. Handles the wet and stays the trip well.

danger_horse.name: Akkadian Emperor
danger_horse.reason: Class runner of the field coming off a win.

selections.name: Areprice
selections.reason: Dominant debut winner by 5 lengths. Looks to be a cut above these and should handle the rise in grade.

selections.name: Boomtowns
selections.reason: Expensive colt from the top stable (Gollan). Won a recent trial and scratched from a harder race for this.

selections.name: Swift Dragon
selections.reason: Won a trial by 9 lengths recently. Showed ability on debut and strips fitter here.

selections.name: Radomir
selections.reason: Trial winner resuming. Drawn well and could surprise.

selections.name: Cherry Bomshell
selections.reason: Won maiden at this track/distance emphatically last start. Looks a progressive type.

selections.name: Night Market
selections.reason: Gollan debutant who won a trial by over 5 lengths. Big watch.

selections.name: Esperanza
selections.reason: Won on debut beating a subsequent winner. Has to overcome the wide draw but has ability.

selections.name: Sun Sister
selections.reason: Won last start on soft going. Conditions suit.

selections.name: Pure Alpha
selections.reason: Brings strong southern form (2nd at Caulfield). Handles wet tracks (Soft/Heavy stats are good). The one to beat.

selections.name: So Long Farewell
selections.reason: Won at this track last start. Progressive type who maps well from barrier 3.

selections.name: Brindavan
selections.reason: Consistent galloper, runner-up to the flying Noble Conqueror last time. Must be included.

selections.name: Raf Attack
selections.reason: Class runner but has to carry weight. Good form leading in.

selections.name: Noble Conqueror
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick. Won last two at this track/distance impressively. Loves the soft/heavy.

selections.name: Nails Murphy
selections.reason: Runner-up to Noble Conqueror last start. Meets him better at the weights.

selections.name: Victoria Road
selections.reason: Group 1 placed horse. 2nd last start showed he is back in form. Class runner.

selections.name: Glory Daze
selections.reason: Good fresh run. Will appreciate the step up to the mile.

danger_horse.name: Nails Murphy
danger_horse.reason: The main threat if the top pick falters.

selections.name: Savagery Vibe
selections.reason: Won last start at this track on soft going. In peak form and drops in weight.

selections.name: Estrondo
selections.reason: Forgive last start. Won two back. Proven heavy track winner.

selections.name: Lost His Beans
selections.reason: Excellent fresh record (5:3-1-0). Will be hitting the line hard.

selections.name: Restonica
selections.reason: Resuming off a trial win. Has class.

danger_horse.name: Estrondo
danger_horse.reason: Heavy track ability makes him dangerous.

selections.name: Earn To Burn
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick. Won by 4.5L two starts back. Fast horse who handles the conditions.

selections.name: Isti Star
selections.reason: Resuming. Classy type who was runner-up in Listed grade here. Trial winner.

selections.name: Angel Ladder
selections.reason: Maher runner with solid form in Melbourne. Watch market.

selections.name: Get Ready Lass
selections.reason: Runner-up to Earn To Burn last time. Weight swing in her favor.

selections.name: Hatchet
selections.reason: Won last two starts including a dominant 2.75L win last time. Handles soft (14:4-2-2). The one to beat.

selections.name: Battlefield
selections.reason: Won at this track/distance last start. Loves Eagle Farm (9:3-2-0).

selections.name: Hell
selections.reason: Consistent. 3rd to Hatchet last start. Gets a weight swing.

selections.name: Vodka Martini
selections.reason: Good wet tracker. 4th last start, can improve.

selections.name: Rhapsody Chic
selections.reason: Elite heavy track statistics (5 starts, 3 wins). Fitter for recent run. Massive chance on the wet track.

selections.name: Slippin' Jimmy
selections.reason: Consistent type. Placed last start in this grade. Handles soft.

selections.name: Weigall Tiger
selections.reason: Solid record at the track. Drawn the rail.

selections.name: Edited By
selections.reason: Class runner. 4th last start. Good draw.
